# Kratos Plugin

General-purpose multi-agent orchestration for features, research, and project insights.

## Task Routing

| User Intent | Route | Agent |
|-------------|-------|-------|
| Project questions | `/kratos:inquiry` | Metis |
| Git history | `/kratos:inquiry` | Clio |
| Best practices / docs | `/kratos:inquiry` | Mimir |
| Decompose feature | `/kratos:decompose` | Daedalus |
| Simple task (test, fix, review) | `/kratos:quick` | Artemis / Ares / Hermes |
| Complex feature | `/kratos:main` | Full 8-stage pipeline |

## Execution Modes

- **Normal** (default): 2 Opus / 5 Sonnet
- **Eco** (`eco`, `budget`, `cheap`): 0 Opus / 2 Sonnet / 5 Haiku
- **Power** (`power`, `max`, `full-power`): 7 Opus

## Key Paths

- `.claude/feature/<name>/` — Feature artifacts and status.json
- `.claude/.Arena/` — Shared project knowledge (Metis)
- `.claude/.Arena/insights/` — Cached research (Mimir, TTL-based)

## Detailed Reference

For agent roster, model routing tables, Arena structure, session continuity, implementation modes, and all commands, see `docs/user-guide.md`.
